You are my hero!!

Can someone help out and list the (SMA) Semi major axis of Cercani?

I figure the data would be in the Kopernicus files but I'm unable to download the mod at work at present and wanted to do some calculations for a mission while I'm waiting for some code to compile.
Sigma binary configs for prima/secunda seems to be either outdated or irrevelant to new version of sigma binary

**GG for your mod ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")**

**Edited <time datetime="2017-08-25T01:17:16Z" title="08/25/2017 01:17  AM" data-short="6 yr">August 25, 2017</time> by SamBelanger**
  
:)

[@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/) **I think you forgot to write in COMPATIBLE MODS:** ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Spoiler

[OptionalAtmosphere](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/163142-wip-130-optionalatmosphere-oa-v14/) Adds any non-existents atmospheres on any planets and moons of the Cercani system ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

This is the old mod. It's not longer being updated as I'm rebooting it in another post. Also, please, don't spam mentions so much, it can get annoying.

I'll mention your mod when I first release Other\_Worlds Reboot, so don't worry for the momment.

¯\\_(ツ)\_/¯
This mod and the 1.3 version no longer work. Sigma Binary throws up 6 errors.

For all the people still here waiting for the future of this mod, I'm redoing Other Worlds here: 

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedcontent="" data-embedid="embed9061370474" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/164146-13x-wip-other_worlds-star-pack-reboot-redoing-the-whole-system-again/&do=embed" style="height:211px;max-width:502px;"></iframe>

The rework is still not finished, but you can still play with the original version, just make sure to NOT USE SIGMA BINARY, as it changed the way it worked.

If you have any suggestion for the mod, please go to the new post, as this version of the mod won't be updated any longer with new content.

Looks interesting but Module manager barfs a lot of error messages: 

LOG 17:04:41.646] [ModuleManager] :BEFORE[SQUAD] pass   

[LOG 17:04:41.647] [ModuleManager] Applying update OtherWorlds/CercaniSystem/-CONFIGS-/PrimaSecunda\_SigmaBinary/@Kopernicus to Kopernicus/Config/System/Kopernicus

This Other\_Worlds doesn't have compatibility with the newest SigmaBinary.

If you want to use the pack at the same time with it, delete every .cfg related to SigmaBinary over OtherWorlds/CercaniSystem/-CONFIGS-/
Imagine taking 8 years to finish a mod. smh Niako...
